Post-Match Reflections: Shakib Al Hasan starred with a half-century in Bangladesh's win over Netherlands.
The result puts Bangladesh in control of their fate in Group D and the likely qualifiers along with South Africa.
Miscellaneous Highlights: Shakib Al Hasan played an unbeaten 64* to help Bangladesh post 159/5.
Tanzid Hasan Sakib and Mahmudullah made crucial contributions with the bat.
Taskin Ahmed and Mustafizur Rahman were key with the ball, dismissing openers Michael Levitt and Scott Edwards respectively.
The Dutch managed to reach 134/8 but fell short by 25 runs.
